means: （现主要用于术语中）在上的，压在上面的，上覆的

word_mean: 盖在上面的，压在上面的

sentence.Network_en: Today chock - shield support is extensively used to control the superjacent strata of longwall face.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin superjacent-, from super- 'over' + jacere 'to lie'

means.word_mean: 1. lying immediately above or on something else
